attributes.action: Go back to rubbish and recycle collection every week
attributes.additional_details: It's making our community smelly,dirty and downtrodden. Flys and maggots are not uncommon and the roads and pavements are being used as dumping grounds.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is a matter for your local council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
